content: TIL Zulip lets you write a date and time with <time that will show the time in the reader's timezone. E.g. 2020-07-17T16:00:00+02:00

Well I learnt this from the 3.0 release notes :sweat_smile: for reference: https://blog.zulip.com/2020/07/16/zulip-3-0-released/
